Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Willie Revillame did not make the alleged remarks about President Duterte.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a digitally altered graphic.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that selling government assets is the only solution for providing aid to typhoon victims.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation that the graphic was manipulated and falsely attributed to Willie Revillame.
